title: Episode 236: Errors We Repeat in Politics, Pt. 2
itunes:title: Episode 236: Errors We Repeat in Politics, Pt. 2
description:
We all have a tendency to repeat things we hear. But when many people start repeating the same thing, we come to believe that the thing must be true. Unfortunately, this happens a lot when it comes to politics and government. This is the first of a two-part episode in which we discuss incorrect things that people tend to think are correct simply because they get repeated.

 

Get Your Copy of Cooperation and Coercion Now!
